actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported to Senate by Senator McClure with an amendment. With written report No. 98-256.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 437.
Passed Senate with an amendment by Voice Vote.

actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

actions.text: Ordered to be Reported.
Reported to House by House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.  Report No: 98-529.
Placed on Union Calendar No: 302.
Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Passed House by Voice Vote.
Cleared for White House.
Measure Signed in Senate.
Presented to President.
Signed by President.
Became Public Law No: 98-170.

official_title: A bill to amend the boundaries of the Cumberland Island National Seashore.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Revises the boundaries of the Cumberland Island National Seashore in Georgia.

titles.title: A bill to amend the boundaries of the Cumberland Island National Seashore.
